rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with ample lighting and natural ventilation as per Vastu. It is designed to facilitate positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open space for gatherings; oriented towards the east to harness morning sunlight in accordance with Vastu and ensure industrial aesthetics.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, providing a separate dining space aligned with good air circulation.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern industrial kitchen with stainless steel finishes, positioned in the southwest per Vastu guidelines for culinary activities.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom featuring an en-suite bathroom and closet; designed to face north-east for auspicious energy.

rooms.name: Swimming Pool Area
rooms.description: Integrated swimming pool area on the eastern side ensuring privacy and minimal disturbance from the industrial elements.

openings.details: Large entrance door designed to maximize energy flow in line with Vastu, complemented by decorative windows on either side.
Operable windows ensuring cross ventilation across living and dining areas.
Strategically placed to maximize natural light in the common spaces while maintaining industrial aesthetics.
